com.xatkit.core.server

Class RestHandlerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.xatkit.core.server.RestHandlerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RestHandlerException
extends Exception
    An exception thrown by RestHandlers to notify the XatkitServer.

    This exception is used to set the HTTP response's status code in the XatkitServer: by default the server returns a status code 200, but it will return a 404 if the RestHandler threw a RestHandlerException.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
